home.heroSubtitle: Discover the latest trends in luxury interior design.

deal.title: Deal of the Month
deal.description: Get up to 30% off on all summer essentials. Limited time offer for our premium members.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging.

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Standard shipping usually takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping takes 1-2 business days.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and times vary by location.

items.question: How can I track my order?
items.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your package.

items.text: Absolutely stunning quality. The attention to detail is unmatched. I've never received so many compliments.
items.author: Sarah Jenkins

items.text: The shopping experience was seamless, and the packaging made unboxing feel like a special event. Highly recommend!
items.author: Michael Chen

items.text: I was hesitant at first, but the quality exceeded my expectations. Fast shipping and excellent customer support.
items.author: Emma Wilson

items.text: Beautiful design and premium materials. It's clearly built to last. A wonderful addition to my collection.
items.author: David Thompson

items.text: Customer service was incredibly helpful in answering all my questions. The product arrived earlier than expected.
items.author: James Miller

items.text: A truly premium shopping experience from start to finish. I will definitely be a returning customer.
items.author: Jessica Lee

home.noProducts: No products found in this section.

hero.description: Experience the epitome of elegance with our curated selection of bespoke furniture. Designed for those who appreciate the finer details.

footer.description: Elevating your lifestyle with premium curated collections. Quality meets aesthetics in every detail.

about.title: About Us
about.metaDescription: Learn about our mission, values, and the team behind Luxe.
about.heroSubtitle: Redefining the future of commerce with premium quality and sustainable practices.
about.missionDesc: We believe that style shouldn't come at the cost of the planet. Our mission is to create timeless pieces that are ethically sourced, sustainably produced, and built to last. We're not just selling products; we're curating a lifestyle of conscious consumption.
about.communityDesc: Building a supportive network of like-minded individuals.
about.secureShoppingDesc: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data.
about.fastDeliveryDesc: Get your orders delivered to your doorstep quickly.
about.customerLoveDesc: We are dedicated to providing the best experience for our customers.
about.teamSubtitle: The creative minds and passionate souls behind the brand.
about.teamQuote: Passionate about creating things that matter.
about.ctaSubtitle: Explore our latest collection and become part of our growing community.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services, shipping, and policies.
faq.a1: We offer global shipping. Standard delivery takes 5-7 business days, while express shipping arrives within 2-3 business days.
faq.a2: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location.
faq.a3: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and with original tags attached.
faq.q4: How can I track my order?
faq.a4: Once your order ships, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number to monitor your package's journey.
